definition[0]: to send someone’s letters or possessions to their new address from their old address
example[0]: My flatmate said she’d send on all my post.
definition[1]: to send something that has been received to another place so that it can be dealt with
example[1]: The data is then sent on to the Census Bureau.
example[2]: Don’t let your paperwork pile up: send it on as soon as possible and work to a deadline.
